import React ,{useState} from 'react' import './css/MessagePannel.css' import MessageSenderLayout from './MessageSenderLayout' import {Row ,Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import MessageReceiveLayout from './MessageReceiveLayout' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const MessagePannel = ({socket}) => { const [newMessage ,add_New_Message] = useState([]) const username = useSelector(state => state.user.profile.username); socket.on("message", (msg)=>{ }) return (
) } export default MessagePannel
